name: elevatorsaga
description: Elevator Saga =================== The elevator programming game

scripts.prebuild: rm -rf dist/* && npm run copy-static && npm run build-tests
scripts.prebuild-tests: $(mkdir dist/test) && cp -r test/*.html dist/test && cp -r test/jasmine dist/test/jasmine
scripts.copy-static: cp -r font-awesome-4.1-1.0 dist/ && cp -r libs dist/ && cp *.html dist/ && cp *.css dist/
